import React from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faThumbsUp, faThumbsDown, faEdit, faTrash } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import './PostDetail.css'; function OwnPostDetail({ post, navigate }) { return (

{post.title}

by {post.author} (Author)

Price: â‚¬{parseFloat(post.price).toFixed(2)}

{post.description}

10 2

Posted by: {post.user_name || 'Unknown'}

); } export default OwnPostDetail;
